Name: Jules
About the game: The whole country suddenly becomes full of Canc's army of the undead. It is now up to Jules and his Subweapon Master Sir to fight his way through the hordes and face Canc in a finale battle in the castle. In this action-platformer game , inspired by retro games, you'll hop from level to level , fight against various enemies and show your skills in boss fights. WHATS IN? 5 different scenarios linear level to level gameplay (6 levels) reduced bit style graphics three special subweapons (sword, axe, cross) 6 bossfights oldschool retro gameplay hardmode without subweapons and stronger enemies
